meanings.definition: Chippies (noun): informal term for French fries or potato chips
meanings.sent1: I love to eat chippies with ketchup.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone enjoyed the chippies.
meanings.sent3: The chippies were the first to disappear from the snack table.
meanings.sent4: The chippies were like crunchy little bites of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly cooked chippies filled the room.

meanings.definition: Chippies (verb): to make small cuts or chips in something
meanings.sent1: She carefully chippies the wood to create a design.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor chippies away at the marble block.
meanings.sent3: He chippies the edges of the paper to give it a decorative look.
meanings.sent4: The artist chippies at the clay to reveal the hidden shape within.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter chippies the excess wood to perfect the details.

meanings.definition: Chippies (adjective): relating to or characteristic of a chippy or fish and chip shop
meanings.sent1: The chippies smell from the nearby shop was enticing.
meanings.sent2: We decided to have dinner at the chippies place down the street.
meanings.sent3: The chippies sign outside the shop flickered in the evening light.
meanings.sent4: The chippies atmosphere in the restaurant was cozy and welcoming.
meanings.sent5: The chippies decor of the shop reminded me of seaside vacations.
